body:
Comment 3: 
Phew.  That makes a lot more sense.  Somewhere in that path
you must have had a letter that was not / or A-Z or a-z or 0-9 or _.
As I said, this bug should now be fixed: we don't assume just those
letters anymore.

We'll have the fix in the next release, or you can use "hg pull -u"
to get it now.
_Status changed to **Fixed**._
